What is a Software Component?

Hardware Component

  • Reusable Unit of Composition

The interface of a software component:

  1. describes the internal features of the componentâ€™s
  2. clearly separates the surface of the component from its internal implementation
  3. describes the functionality provided by the component
  4. references the required interfaces on which the component depends upon
  5. needs to be kept as simple as possible
